reporter_caption.center: RHODE ISLAND CHAMBER OF COMMERCE v. HACKETT, 120 R.I. 996 (1978)

caption.center: RHODE ISLAND CHAMBER OF COMMERCE v. MARY C. HACKETT, Director,

opinion.posture: Petition for writ of certiorari is granted. Petitioner's motion for a stay of the Superior Court judgment pending review is denied.
opinion.attorneys:
William C. Hillman, for petitioner.
Charles H. McLaughlin, for respondent.
